<samp>'''celestials.png-atlas'''</samp> is a procedurally-generated [[texture atlas]] used to store textures for the [[sun]], [[moon]] phases and [[end flash]]es.

== Format ==
<samp>celestials.png-atlas</samp> is a generated 256Ã—128-pixel file that stores textures for celestial bodies.
